forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 68. West wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. Southwest wind 3 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere welcomes you with an embrace of clarity and warmth, a pleasant contrast to the more typical marine influence that often blankets the city. The radiant sun bathes the iconic skyline in a soft glow, its rays painting the towers with a gentle vibrance. With a high around sixty-eight, a light breeze dances through the air, offering just enough chill to remind you that no day here is unaccompanied by a whisper of the ocean. Tonight promises to hold onto this clarity, and the lows will settle at a comfortable fifty-three, making a light jacket a wise companion as twilight descends.

With such inviting conditions, consider taking a stroll along the Embarcadero, where the shimmering waters of the bay mingle with the lively energy of the city. Perhaps an al fresco lunch at one of the numerous cafes will offer a delightful respite, allowing you to savor the day while basking in the sun and the company of friends. Opt for layered attire to ensure comfort throughout the day—perhaps a lightweight shirt complemented by a cardigan to ease into the evening. Now is the time to relish the beauty of San Francisco, to engage with the vibrant streets, unobscured by fog, and immerse yourself in the pulse of the city.
